summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the month of October 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, providing insight into the financial activities associated with the trust during this period.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details the account balance of the Butterfly Trust as of October 31, 2018, showing an ending balance of $706,341.71.
The account had a beginning balance of $870,706.34 on October 1, 2018.
There were no checks paid or service charges during the statement period.
An interest payment of $539.50 was credited to the account on October 31, 2018.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
